results.p: You have to go to the stocking stuffer of kitakami and go and press A on the pecharunt, something only hinted at IN THE TRAILER FOR THE DLC.
The Mythical Pecha Berry enables an event about poison, which contrasts a regular Pecha Berry's effect of curing the poison status condition. In ...
Ruby​/​Sapphire Emerald, A hold item that heals poisoning in battle. FireRed​/​LeafGreen, When held by a POKéMON, it will be used in battle to cure poison.
